name: Horned Owl Simulator
description:
Fly around the huge open world map as a giant horned owl. Battle against Puma, Fox, Dog, Bear, and Wolves. Help him grow from a weak bird into a strong, full grown hunter owl. Hunt down your natural enemies.
Game Features:
**9 Different Forest Animals included
**6 Special Battle Scenarios in Survival Mode
**Thrive in this huge 3D Forest Landscape
**Weather changes from dynamic times of day plus
**Upgrade your eagle, Strength, Speed and Stamina
**12 Challenging Simulator Adventures to Complete

DYNAMIC SCENERY
Every game is different. The animals and time of day are dynamic.
3D GAMEPLAY EXCELLENCE
Easy to understand gameplay, with epic 3D graphics and open world style.
UPGRADE YOUR HUNTING OWL
Use your meat points to improve your Strength, Stamina, and Speed
SPECIAL BATTLE SIMULATIONS
Try to Survive these challenging battles. Wrestle with other eagles and owls.
9 ANIMALS INCLUDED
Cheetah, Snake, Scorpion, Eagle, Bear, Wolf and more . . .
